attributes.action: Bestow upon Humphrey Lyttelton an honour for the contribution he has made to British entertainment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Humph is a British institution. We should show him our appreciation and affection by bestowing upon him an honour that is endorsed by the people he has entertained for so long. He is, of course, free to turn this one down as well.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bestow upon Humphrey Lyttelton an honour for the contribution he has made to British entertainment."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12546.asp

Prime Minister's Office
